title: tarzana
content:
Hi Everyone,

Can you suggest a text face to compliment tarzana?

The client has a logo in Koblenz with subhead tarzana. It's a adventure/extreme bike + spin indoor and outdoor gym.

Thanks,

cpeace
author: cpeace

comments.content:
I would say [Fairplex](http://web.archive.org/web/20131225211251/http:/www.emigre.com/EF.php?fid=180)

George Triantafyllakos - backpacker.gr

Hi.  
I think Vista from Emigre is a good option.  
It seems like a same type structure.

Best.

Marc Salinas
